name: THE VACCINE CURE (early access)
description:
I've recently lost my job of Marketing (social media), this covid-19 it's not about health only, but also financial.

So i decided: Instead complaining about it, i'm gonna use it to make something good.

I've started creating this game (that by the way is my first game and it's made on Construct 3).

I used elements that we are living with this pandemic, but also to give to you guys a good message about this all thing.

You are an VACCINE, and your mission it's to cure the people

I need to councern about collecting coins (financial), you need to be fast and collect the extra time (any second it's important) and the most important, YOU NEED TO SAVE THE PEOPLE, only saving them you will be able to go to the next level.

THIS GAME IT'S EXTREMELY HARD! So, good luck!!

Every money i make with this game its going to help me to live in this hard moment that we are living, So, i really thank you if your purchase this game and share it with your friends.
